description:
A television station is producing a documentary on modern yakuza. They attempt to interview Nitta, but things don’t go quite as planned.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Man Thirsty for Blood, Violence, and Money
Chi to Bouryoku to Kane ni Ueta Otoko
L`homme assoiffé de sang, de violence et d`argent
血と暴力と金に餓えた男
